metadata.title: CVE-2024-36940 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:pinctrl: core: delete incorrect free in pinctrl_enable() The "pctldev"struct is allocated in devm_pinctrl_register_and_init(). It's a devm_managed pointer that is freed by devm_pinctrl_dev_release(), so freeing itin pinctrl_enable() will lead to a double free. Thedevm_pinctrl_dev_release() function frees the pindescs and destroys themutex as well.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
